amendment.description: Amendment prohibits agencies from taking into account the "social cost of carbon" from the "Technical Support Document: Social Cost of Carbon for Regulatory Impact Analysis Under Executive Order 12866 from May 2013 or November 2013.".
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part C of House Report 113-374 to not allow agencies under this legislation to take into account the `social cost of carbon' from the `Technical Support Document: Social Cost of Carbon for Regulatory Impact Analysis Under Executive Order 12866 from May 2013 or November 2013.'.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McKinley amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 222 - 188 (Roll no. 109).
